action.action-desc: Mr. Lucas (for himself and Mr. Heck) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To clarify membership requirements for the Board of Directors of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the State Regulatory Representation Clarification Act of 2017.
The purposes of this Act areâ€”

paragraph.text: to reaffirm the importance of having the perspective of State banking regulators on the Board of Directors of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation; and
to ensure that the Board of Directors of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation includes a member who has served as a State banking supervisor.

section.header: State banking supervisor experience on Board of Directors of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation
section.text: Section 2(a)(1)(C) of the Federal Deposit Insurance Act (12 U.S.C. 1812(a)(1)(C)) is amended by striking State bank supervisory experience and inserting served as a State bank supervisor, as defined in section 3(r)(1).

Nothing in this Act may be construed as affecting the appointment or reappointment of an individual who was a member of the Board of Directors of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation as of January 1, 2017.
